author: vorot93

author: vorot93
content: <@!337264303063171072> it *is* possible to ergonomically write efficient and somewhat safe code in modern C++

author: vorot93
content: but yes, doesn't make much sense to start new C++ projects in 2020, unless you are constrained by platform (e.g. making an Ethereum client for Xbox and whatnot)
